data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hsiao, Yun, Li, Yun, Liu, Zhenhua, Pang, Hong (2016): A new species of Synchroa Newman from China (Coleoptera: Synchroidae). Zootaxa 4093 (4): 595-600, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.4.13
